# PHP/CheckFlushIo

Check if flush should be called explicitly after buffered io.

## Cache variables

* `HAVE_FLUSHIO`
  Whether flush should be called explicitly after a buffered io.

## Basic usage

```cmake
# CMakeLists.txt
include(PHP/CheckFlushIo)
```
